ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and I seek refuge with You, my Lord, from their presence.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I seek refuge in You lest they come to me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I even seek Your refuge, my Lord, lest they should approach me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I seek your protection should they approach me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And my Lord, (I seek) Your refuge from their coming to me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they should come near me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I seek refuge in Thee! O my Lord! from their presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and I take refuge in Thee, O my Lord, lest they attend me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I seek refuge in Thee, my Lord, lest they be present with me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I seek refuge with You, Lord, lest they should come near me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I seek refuge with Thee, my Lord! lest they may be present with me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and I seek Your protection, my Lord, from their presence near me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And I seek refuge with Thee O my Lord! lest they should come near me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O my Lord, I seek refuge in You lest they attend me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I seek refuge with You, my Lord, lest they become present.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:98] And I seek protection in You, my Lord, lest they visit me’, in any of my affairs, for they only visit to bring ill.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I seek refuge in Thee, my Lord, lest they) the devils (be present with me) upon praying, upon recitation and upon death,
